Method Detail

evaluate

public static boolean evaluate(Grid grid,
                               Derivative derivative,
                               FiniteDifferenceModel method,
                               double r,
                               boolean printProgress,
                               java.io.PrintStream ps)
Performs a complete Finite Difference Method pricing, starting from the maturity of the instrument evaluated to the present time

Parameters:
grid - The grid
derivative - The derivative to be priced
method - A FiniteDifferenceModel implementation
r - The interest rate
printProgress - True if the method should print hash signs at each 1% progress in the pricing process
ps - A PrintStream to be used in case hash signs should be printed to signal progress
Returns:
True if the pricing was successful, false otherwise
